medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain with elevated liver function tests (LFTs).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: RUQ pain was intermittent, with recent elevation in LFTs noted. The patient reported post-operative epigastric pain after ERCP and chest pain in the inferior aspect of the sternum. Duration and intensity of symptoms not specified, with no nausea or vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Obstructive Sleep Apnea on BiPAP, history of Roux-en-Y gastric bypass, cholecystectomy, bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with diabetes and hyperlipidemia; sister and daughter with unclear thyroid disorder.
